ygData.subject: Gay Guilds in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: I just wanted to add two comments about all this new interest we seem to be getting: I am so glad that gay guilds on EQ are attracting new members. Sam stopped
ygData.messageBody:
I just wanted to add two comments about all this new interest we seem
to be getting:

I am so glad that gay guilds on EQ are attracting new members. Sam
stopped by Lanys last night, and we had a blast with him. I encourage
everyone to get involved in the guilds on other servers, if not to
play hardcore, necessarily, but just to meet the nice people on
Rodcet and Nameless AND Lanys. Alex (Rugen) and I had a blast on
Nameless helping Souldreamer get their guild underway, and, as a
result, I'm encouraging the Ordo to visit the other servers so we all
get to know each other a bit more.

The even-handed way that the other guilds have treated new EQ'ers is
to be commended - it's nice to see that we three guilds (and more are
out there, from what I've heard) don't feel the need to compete for
newbies, rather we can help new folks find a place they will feel
comfortable in a fun game. My hats off to Mystic and Nameless Love!

I also wanted to let everyone know that Ordo has a website at
http://ordo.darke.net with ezBoards open to the public for posting.

All the best!
Jack Cole
